name: Astray (itch) (DevLiamW)
description:
Credits

Liam West (DevLiamW)

Controls

W, A, S, D - Movement

Left Shift - Sprint

Left Alt - Crouch

E - Interact

Space - Jump

Summary

You are located in a stone-age village, and your sanity is slowly depleting. Survive until dusk by interacting with the quickly changing environment. If your sanity is reduced to nothing then you will become insane forever.

Features

Psychosis simulation.

Against the clock.

Interact with the environment to sustain your sanity.

References

All third-party assets are found in the Unity asset store, and are free to use. These have also been documented and can be displayed upon request.

Links

Website: https://devliamw.webflow.io/
